titleStmt.title: A briefe discourse against the outwarde apparell and ministring garmentes of the popishe church
titleStmt.author: Crowley, Robert, 1518?-1588.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Egidius van der Erve],

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and place of publication from STC.
Running title reads: The vnfolding of the Popes attyre.
Union Theological Seminary copy identified as STC 6078 on UMI microfilm.
Reproductions of the originals in Harvard University. Library and the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
Appears at reel 317 (Harvard University. Library) and at reel 880 (Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library copy).
